sections.summary:
Property Manager with vast experience in real estate management. Strengths include sales skills, critical thinking and the ability to communicate
with individuals at all levels.
Highlights
Microsoft Office 2010
Microsoft Project 2007 Fair housing mandates
Sage Timberline Accounting Knowledge of leasing and market conditions
Yardi Voyager Multi-family property management
Microsoft Office 2010 Suite Strong organizational skills
Sage Timberline Office Sharp problem solver
Yardi Voyager Training manual contributor
Payroll expertise Dedicated to process improvement
Accomplishments
Developed annual budgets, including determining short and long-term goals to support the overall profit and growth objectives.
